query:
INSERT INTO measurement_values(station, type, lot, ringid, value, uppert, lowert, nennmass, abmass, data, pass)
	VALUES 
		('{{{msg.station}}}', '{{{msg.type}}}' ,'{{{msg.lot}}}', 0 , {{{msg.value}}}, {{{msg.ot}}}, {{{msg.ut}}}, {{{msg.config.nennmass}}}, {{{msg.abmass}}}, array[{{{msg.payload}}}] , {{{msg.pass}}}),
		('{{{msg.station}}}', '{{{msg.type2}}}' ,'{{{msg.lot}}}', 0 , {{{msg.value2}}}, {{{msg.ot_sw}}}, {{{msg.ut_sw}}}, {{{msg.config.nennmass}}}, {{{msg.abmass}}}, array[{{{msg.payload}}}] , {{{msg.pass2}}})
	RETURNING extract(epoch from created);

query:
INSERT INTO public.config( 
station,
name,
nennmass,
m1_order,
m1_sensor_id,
m1_abmass,
m1_ot,
m1_ut,
m2_order,
m2_sensor_id,
m2_abmass,
m2_ot,
m2_ut,
m2_ot_sw,
m2_ut_sw,
m3_order,
m3_sensor_id,
m3_abmass,
m3_ot,
m3_ut,
m4_order,
m4_sensor_id,
m4_abmass,
m4_ot,
m4_ut,
m5_order,
m5_sensor_id,
m5_1_sensor_id,
m5_abmass,
m5_ot,
m5_ut,
m6_order,
m6_sensor_id,
m6_abmass,
m6_ot,
m6_ut,
m7_order,
m7_sensor_id,
m7_abmass,
m7_ot,
m7_ut,
m8_order,
m8_sensor_id,
m8_abmass,
m8_ot,
m8_ut,
m9_order,
m9_sensor_id,
m9_abmass,
m9_ot,
m9_ut,
m10_order,
m10_sensor_id,
m10_abmass,
m10_ot,
m10_ut
)
SELECT station,
name,
nennmass,
m1_order,
m1_sensor_id,
m1_abmass,
m1_ot,
m1_ut,
m2_order,
m2_sensor_id,
m2_abmass,
m2_ot,
m2_ut,
m2_ot_sw,
m2_ut_sw,
m3_order,
m3_sensor_id,
m3_abmass,
m3_ot,
m3_ut,
m4_order,
m4_sensor_id,
m4_abmass,
m4_ot,
m4_ut,
m5_order,
m5_sensor_id,
m5_1_sensor_id,
m5_abmass,
m5_ot,
m5_ut,
m6_order,
m6_sensor_id,
m6_abmass,
m6_ot,
m6_ut,
m7_order,
m7_sensor_id,
m7_abmass,
m7_ot,
m7_ut,
m8_order,
m8_sensor_id,
m8_abmass,
m8_ot,
m8_ut,
m9_order,
m9_sensor_id,
m9_abmass,
m9_ot,
m9_ut,
m10_order,
m10_sensor_id,
m10_abmass,
m10_ot,
m10_ut
FROM public.config WHERE id={{{msg.payload}}}
RETURNING *;

name: Gauge3 Overrides
format:
<style>
md-card.nr-dashboard-template.gauge3 .g-body {
    border-radius: 50%;
}

md-card.nr-dashboard-template.gauge3 .g-body::before {    
    border-radius:50%;
}
md-card.nr-dashboard-template.gauge3 .g-rivets {
    display:none;
}
</style>

name: gauge-style-advanced
format:
<!--<link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/hotnipi-gauge.css">-->
<style>
:root {
    --needle-color: #001100;
    --needle-color-secondary: #ffdd30;
    --target-needle-color: #ffa500;
    --red-ticks: 9;
    --zone-color-high: #ff5d4ebf;
    --zone-color-warn: #ffb52d8c;
    --zone-color-normal: #91ff4e85;
    --zone-color-low: #4ec3ff85
}
.g-zone {
    position: absolute;
    width: 82%;
    height: 82%;
    top: 8%;
    left: 10%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-radius: 0 100% 0 0;
    border-color: var(--zone-color-normal);
    border-top: 7px solid;
    border-right: 7px solid;
    clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 100% 0%, 0% 0%, 0% 100% );
}
.g-zone.high {
    border-color: var(--zone-color-high);
    clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 100% 0%, 16% 0%, 0% 100% );
}
.g-zone.warn {
    border-color: var(--zone-color-warn);
    clip-path: polygon(16% 0%, 100% 0%, 73% 0%, 0% 100% );
}
.g-zone.normal {
    border-color: var(--zone-color-normal);
    clip-path: polygon(0% 50%, 100% 0%, 100% 67%, 0% 100% );
}
.g-zone.low {
    border-color: var(--zone-color-low);
    clip-path: polygon(100% 68%, 100% 0%, 100% 100%, 0% 100% );
}

.g-wrapper-label-0 {
    grid-template-rows: 1fr;
}

.g-wrapper-label-3 {
    grid-template-rows: 1fr 3fr;
}

.g-wrapper-label-4 {
    grid-template-rows: 1fr 4fr;
}

.g-wrapper {
    display: grid;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-items: center;
}

.g-header {
    display: flex;
    text-align: center;
}

.g-wrapper-label-0 .g-container {
    height: calc(100% - 6px);
}

.g-container {
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    user-select: none;
    width: 100%;
    height: calc(100% - 10.5px);
}

.g-body {
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    height: 98%;
    width: 98%;
    border-radius: 15%;
    box-shadow: 0px 5px 8px #00000045;
    background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(78, 78, 78, 1) 0%, rgba(215, 215, 215, 1) 99%, rgba(236, 236, 236, 1) 100%);
}

.g-body::before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    top: 0px;
    right: 0px;
    bottom: 0px;
    left: 0px;
    opacity: 0.1;
    border-radius: 15%;
    background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0naHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmcnIHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnPgogIDxyZWN0IHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnIGZpbGw9J3doaXRlJy8+CiAgPHBhdGggZD0nTTAgNUw1IDBaTTYgNEw0IDZaTS0xIDFMMSAtMVonIHN0cm9rZT0nIzg4OCcgc3Ryb2tlLXdpZHRoPScxJy8+Cjwvc3ZnPg==");
    background-repeat: repeat;
}

.g-ring {
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    align-content: center;
    width: 94%;
    height: 94%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(78, 78, 78, 1) 0%, rgba(215, 215, 215, 1) 99%, rgba(236, 236, 236, 1) 100%);
}

.quarter-top-right>.g-ring {
    width: 90%;
    height: 90%;
    border-radius: 15% 85% 15% 15%;
}
.quarter-top-left>.g-ring {
    width: 90%;
    height: 90%;
    border-radius: 85% 15% 15% 15%;
}

.g-plate {
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    width: 93%;
    height: 93%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px #000000a3;
    background: radial-gradient(circle, rgb(196 205 209) 0%, rgb(177 183 186) 40%, rgb(191 193 194) 100%);
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-plate {
    width: 95%;
    height: 95%;
    border-radius: 15% 100% 15% 15%;
    background: radial-gradient(farthest-corner at 24% 70%, rgb(207 209 211) 0%, rgb(177 183 186) 50%, rgb(191 193 194) 129%);
}
.quarter-top-left *>.g-plate {
    width: 95%;
    height: 95%;
    border-radius: 100% 15% 15% 15%;
    background: radial-gradient(farthest-corner at 24% 70%, rgb(207 209 211) 0%, rgb(177 183 186) 50%, rgb(191 193 194) 129%);
}

.g-sector-high {
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    background: #ff00004f;
    transform-origin: 0 0;
    transform: rotate(328deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}

.g-ticks {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 6px black);
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-ticks {
    top: -10%;
    left: 10%;
}
.quarter-top-left *>.g-ticks {
    top: -10%;
    left: -10%;
    transform: rotate(270deg);
}


.g-tick {
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1px;
    margin-bottom: -1px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 2%, rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 2%, rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 10%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 10%);
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) + 45deg)));
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-tick {
    width: 86%;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(270deg,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 0%, rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 9%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 9%);
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) - 270deg)));
    transform-origin: 0% 0%;
}
.quarter-top-left *>.g-tick {
    width: 86%;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(270deg,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 0%, rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 9%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 9%);
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) - 270deg)));
    transform-origin: -0.5% 0%;
}

.g-tick.clock {
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(360deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(360deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) +270deg)));
}

.g-subtick {
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1px;
    margin-bottom: -1px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 2%, rgb(0 0 0 / 40%) 2%, rgb(0 0 0 / 40%) 6%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 6%);
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) + 45deg)));
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-subtick {
    width: 86%;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(270deg,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 0%, rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 5%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 5%);
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) - 270deg)));
    transform-origin: 0% 0%;
}
.quarter-top-left *>.g-subtick {
    width: 86%;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(270deg,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 0%, rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 5%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 5%);
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) - 270deg)));
    transform-origin: -0.5% 0%;
}

.g-subtick.clock {
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(360deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(360deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) + 270deg)));
}

.g-num {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) + 45deg))) translate(calc(-1px * var(--container-size) * var(--gn-distance))) rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) *-1 - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count))*-1 - 45deg)));
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-num {
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) - 90deg))) translate(calc(-1px * var(--container-size) * var(--gn-distance))) rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) *-1 - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count))*-1 - 270deg)));
}
.quarter-top-left *>.g-num {
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) - 90deg))) translate(calc(-1px * var(--container-size) * var(--gn-distance))) rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) *-1 - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count))*-1 - 360deg)));
}

.g-num.clock {
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(calc(calc(360deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(360deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) + 270deg))) translate(calc(-1px * var(--container-size) * var(--gn-distance))) rotate(calc(calc(360deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) *-1 - calc(calc(360deg / var(--ga-tick-count))*-1 - 270deg)));
}

.g-nums {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    color: #000000a1;
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 20%);
    font-weight: 500;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 10px black);
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-nums {
    top: 40%;
    left: -40%;
}

.quarter-top-left *>.g-nums {
    top: 40%;
    left: 40%;
    transform: rotate(270deg);
}
.g-needle {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%; 
    width: 100%;
    height: 1%;
    filter: drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #00000080);
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(2, 0, 36, 0) 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 15%, var(--needle-color) 15%, var(--needle-color) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 50%);
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--gauge-value, 0deg) / 10) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 20ms;
}

.g-needle-secondary {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2%;
    filter: drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #00000080);
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(2, 0, 36, 0) 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 15%, var(--needle-color-secondary) 15%, var(--needle-color-secondary) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 50%);
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--gauge-value-secondary, 0deg) / 100) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;    
}

.g-target-needle {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1.5%;
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--gauge-target, 0deg) / 100) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;
}

.g-target-needle:before {
    content: "►";
    position: absolute;
    left: -1%;
    top: calc(var(--container-size) * 1%);
    line-height: 0;
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 35%);
    color: #ffdc2d;
    text-shadow: 0 0 3px black;
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-needle {
    position: absolute;
    width: 74%;
    height: 2%;
    top: 89.5%;
    left: 10%;
    background: var(--needle-color);
    transform: rotate(calc(90deg * calc(var(--gauge-value, 0deg) / 100) - 90deg));
    transform-origin: 0% 50%;
}

.quarter-top-left *>.g-needle {
    position: absolute;
    width: 74%;
    height: 2%;
    top: 89.5%;
    left: 90%;
    background: var(--needle-color);
    transform: rotate(calc(90deg * calc(var(--gauge-value, 0deg) / 100) - 270deg));
    transform-origin: 0% 50%;
}

.g-needle.hour {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(2, 0, 36, 0) 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 20%, var(--needle-color) 20%, var(--needle-color) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 50%);
    transition: unset;
    transform: rotate(var(--time-hour));
}

.g-needle.minute {
    top: 49.25%;
    height: 1.5%;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(2, 0, 36, 0) 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 15%, var(--needle-color) 15%, var(--needle-color) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 50%);
    transition: unset;
    transform: rotate(var(--time-minute));
}

.g-needle.second {
    top: 49.5%;
    height: 0.5%;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(2, 0, 36, 0) 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 10%, var(--needle-color) 10%, var(--needle-color) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 50%);
    transform: rotate(var(--time-second));
    transition: unset;
}

.g-needle-ring {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px #0000009c;
    background: var(--needle-color);
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-needle-ring {
    top: 90%;
    left: 10%;
}
.quarter-top-left *>.g-needle-ring {
    top: 90%;
    left: 90%;
}

.g-val {
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    bottom: 8%;
    width: 80px;
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 27%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000050);
    transform: translateX(-50%);
}

/* Add a pseudo-element for the negative sign */
.g-val:before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    left: -1; /* Position the negative sign on the left side */
}
/* Style for negative numbers */
.g-val.negative:before {
    content: "-";
    right: 100%; /* Position the negative sign to the left of the number */
    margin-right: 0px; /* Add some space between the negative sign and the number */
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-val {
    width: 100%;
    bottom: calc(calc(var(--container-size) * 8%) / calc(var(--container-size)/4));
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 25%);
}
.quarter-top-left *>.g-val {
    width: 100%;
    bottom: calc(calc(var(--container-size) * 8%) / calc(var(--container-size)/4));
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 25%);
}
.g-val-ring {
    position: absolute;
    right: 0%;
    top: 0%;
    width: calc(calc(var(--container-size) * 7%) / calc(var(--container-size)/4));
    height: calc(calc(var(--container-size) * 6%) / calc(var(--container-size)/4));
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(78, 78, 78, 1) 0%, rgba(215, 215, 215, 1) 99%, rgba(236, 236, 236, 1) 100%);
}

.quarter-top-right *> .g-val-ring {
    right: 0%;
}
.quarter-top-left *> .g-val-ring {
    left:0%;
}
.g-val-plate {
    position: absolute;
    right: 0%;
    top: 0%;
    width: 90%;
    height: 90%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: #e4e9ee;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px #000000a3;
    transform: translate(-5%, 5%);
}

.g-label {
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 58%;
    width: 100%;
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 18%);
    text-align: center;
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000080);
    transform: translateX(-50%);
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-label {
    left: 35%;
    top: 60%;
    width: 70%;
}

.quarter-top-left *>.g-label {
    left: 65%;
    top: 60%;
    width: 70%;
}

.g-label::after {
    position: absolute;
    content: var(--g-unit);
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    font-size: clamp(1em, calc(var(--container-size) * 40%), 1.5em);
}

.g-rivets {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

.g-rivet {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    border-radius: 50px;
    box-shadow: 0px 2px 4px #000, -1px -1px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #adadad 0%, #d3d3d3 51%, #d1d1d1 68%, #8c8c8c 100%);
}

.g-rivet:nth-child(1) {
    top: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet:nth-child(2) {
    top: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet:nth-child(3) {
    bottom: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet:nth-child(4) {
    bottom: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 2px #222;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}
</style>

name: Logo
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    $(function () {
        
        //add logo
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();

        logo.src = "data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        logo.height = 45;
        div1[0].style.margin = 'auto 10px auto auto';
        div1[0].id="CustomLogo"

        div1.append(logo);

        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            var div2 = $('div#CustomLogo');
            if(div2.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div1);
        }
        addToToolbar()
    });
</script>
